meanwhile the ballast tanks filled with water and the nautilus sank slowly . at a depth of 1,000 feet , it stopped . its propeller churned the waves and it headed due north at a speed of fifteen miles per hour . near the afternoon it was already cruising under the immense frozen carapace of the ice bank .
the door was scarcely closed upon him , when the queen sank , half fainting , into the arms of her women .
the sun was already sinking towards the horizon , and the trees threw long shadows on the ground .

in an instant all the strength of mind of this creature , though drawn from the most vigorous sources , abandoned her ; she sank into a large easy chair , with her arms crossed , her head lowered , and expecting every instant to see a judge enter to interrogate her .
soon after , mrs . reed grew more composed , and sank into a dozing state . i then left her .

i can see captain nemo 's bearing to this day . bracing himself , he waited for the fearsome man - eater with wonderful composure , and when the latter rushed at him , the captain leaped aside with prodigious quickness , avoided a collision , and sank his dagger into its belly . but that was n't the end of the story . a dreadful battle was joined .

the unfortunate woman was exhausted , not by fatigue , but by terror , and when d’artagnan placed his hand upon her shoulder , she sank upon one knee , crying in a choking voice , " kill me , if you please , you shall know nothing ! "
the queen made a curtsy , less from etiquette than because her knees were sinking under her .

captain nemo suffered no pain , but he was visibly sinking .
lord henry laughed . " if a man treats life artistically , his brain is his heart , " he answered , sinking into an arm - chair .

milady let her head sink between her two hands , and tried to recall her ideas , whirling in a mortal vertigo .

we were not much more than a quarter of an hour out of our ship till we saw her sink , and then i understood for the first time what was meant by a ship foundering in the sea . i must acknowledge i had hardly eyes to look up when the seamen told me she was sinking ; for from the moment that they rather put me into the boat than that i might be said to go in , my heart was , as it were , dead within me , partly with fright , partly with horror of mind , and the thoughts of what was yet before me .

it is impossible to express the astonishment of these poor creatures at the noise and fire of my gun : some of them were even ready to die for fear , and fell down as dead with the very terror ; but when they saw the creature dead , and sunk in the water , and that i made signs to them to come to the shore , they took heart and came , and began to search for the creature . i found him by his blood staining the water ; and by the help of a rope , which i slung round him , and gave the negroes to haul , they dragged him on shore , and found that it was a most curious leopard , spotted , and fine to an admirable degree ; and the negroes held up their hands with admiration , to think what it was i had killed him with .
" triple ass ! " said athos , rising ; but he sank down again immediately .
milady uttered a cry of terror and sank upon her knees .
d’artagnan sank on his knees and prayed .
